description: In this twisted hospital of horrors, pain slut Milcah is bound, abused, and fucked by sadistic nurse Aiden Starr. To cure Milcah of her perverted fantasies, Aiden must use every clamp, speculum, cane, whip, strap-on, and hook at her disposal to probe the dark recesses of Milcah's mind, ass, and hungry, dripping cunt. A tough patient, Milcah is unresponsive to treatment until Nurse Starr locks her in an inverted suspension, double penetrating Milcah's helpless, bowed body as she pushes her farther than any sub has gone before.
title: Perverted, Inverted, and Begging for More
